backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented ecommerce and branding features with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, content files, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, and React root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling navigation, hero, categories, products, cart, and contact sections with cart state.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero with brand name, tagline, background image, CTA, and scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Minimal layout wrapper providing a main content container.
Utility for smooth scrolling to sections with header offset.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/sections/CartSec: Renders the shopping cart UI, showing items, quantities, subtotal, and controls for updating or removing items.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact information including email, phone, location, and a button to send an email.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Shows a grid of featured product categories with images and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Product: Renders a product grid with images, details, and an Add to Cart button for each item.
frontend/src/components/sections/Samples: Empty placeholder file for a future Samples section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Empty placeholder file for a future Services section.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with branding, section links, cart badge, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/content/portfolioContent.ts: Empty placeholder for portfolio content definitions.
frontend/src/content/storefrontData.ts: Defines product and category interfaces and provides static sample data for storefront items and categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Implements clientâ€‘side cart state with add, remove, quantity update, subtotal, and item count helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, stored identity handling, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, global fonts, and utility classes for scrolling and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors driven by CSS variables, extended fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, required images, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the South Essentials ecommerce site.
